content: **free pattern viewable on my blog ** https //www sweetsofties com/2022/11/lola-hair-clip html **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/8kskdkuwsj0 the lola hair clip is a sweet accessory that works up in minutes the pattern features two different oval clip styles a lacy edging and a neat edging also included are two floral appliques 5-petal cherry blossom and 6-petal puff flower it is a no-sew project if you attach the flower using hot glue this fast and easy crochet project is beginner friendly as it also comes with photo references and a step-by-step video tutorial all you need is a metal snap barrette clip the style and aesthetics include cottage cottagecore maidcore kawaii mori kei victorian woodland pastel goth classic lolita and sweet lolita the lola clip is perfect to make as a last-minute birthday gift holiday gift party favor cosplay or even to stock up for craft fairs and markets this trendy accessory is suitable for all ages of girls and women such as babies toddlers kids children teens and adults **size ** one size **level ** ★☆☆☆☆ beginner/easy requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches/terms us terms ** fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over chain = chain skip = skip slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet **materials ** light yarn or embroidery thread in desired colors i used hobbii friends cotton 8/4 a fingering weight yarn crochet hook size to go with the yarn/thread i used 2 25mm hook https //amzn to/3fxpjkd metal oval snap hair clip i used https //amzn to/3xktktk yarn needle scissors *this pattern is © 2022 sweet softies for personal use only you may not translate copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may not make a video or teach a class using my patterns without my written consent you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my blog www sweetsofties com no wholesale * www instagram com/sweetsofties @sweetsofties www etsy
